name: The Town of Poe - Chapter One
name_original: The Town of Poe - Chapter One
description:
Setting

The Town of Poe takes place in the Cemetery of Poe where a ghost haunting is occurring and it remains a mystery as to why mysterious objects are appearing. 

Controls:

  • Movement: W, A, S, D
  • Action: X
  • Volume and Sound: Mouse click on the gear
  • Inventory: Mouse click on the inventory bag

To  use full screen, click on the lower right double arrow to capture your whole screen. Press Esc button to escape full screen

To report bugs or compatibility issues, please send an email to: migymigz@yahoo.com. Please don't report bugs or crashes in the comments!

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MigCreatesGames
